product_name: Sierra Designs Pack Trench Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's Sierra Designs Pack Trench Rain Jacket is long, vented and fully featured to beautifully accommodate wearing a pack, whether you're traveling or backpacking. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, the nylon jacket has a polyurethane laminate as well as a durable water repellent finish so precipitation beads up and rolls off. Fully lined with nylon tricot to feel good against your skin. Thigh length to provide more coverage than most rain jackets; still, it weighs just 15 oz. Vertical hip zips let you easily reach your backpack belt while allowing front and rear flaps to provide coverage. Mesh vents under the arms are always open; no need to fiddle with pit zips. Adjustable cuffs and hem seal weather out; offers pack-compatible zippered hand pockets. Lay-flat hood won't bunch up behind your head and is sized to accommodate a hat, not a helmet (helmet-compatible hoods can be overly large). Sierra Designs Pack Trench Rain Jacket for men has a trim cut designed to fit over a base layer and light mid layer.
